BTCUSD.notes: 24/7 trading, wide swings, frequent fakeouts → requires higher confluence in overlap hours (sensitivity reduced by 10%)

XAUUSD.notes: High sensitivity to DXY/US10Y → needs stricter confirmation during overlap (sensitivity reduced by 10%)

EURUSD.notes: Narrower ATR; trades cleaner in London → can loosen slightly in low-vol hours (sensitivity reduced by 10%)

GBPUSD.notes: Similar to EURUSD - moderate volatility, session-sensitive (sensitivity reduced by 10%)

USDJPY.notes: Similar to EURUSD - moderate volatility, session-sensitive (sensitivity reduced by 10%)

ASIAN.notes: Thin liquidity, range conditions → looser threshold (lower bias = lower threshold multiplier)

LONDON.notes: High volatility, strong liquidity → normal to slightly stricter threshold

OVERLAP.notes: Volatility peak, strong momentum → stricter threshold (higher bias = higher threshold multiplier)

NY.notes: Normal volatility, active trading → baseline threshold
